item.title: On Software as Craft
item.author: paige.watson@softwareascraft.com (Paige)
item.description: As A Craft I self-identify as a “Software Crafter”. I believe that the creation of software is a complex endeavor, more akin to an artists work, than that of a plumber, electrician or factory worker. Please be cognizant that I am not putting down anyone who is employed as a plumber, electrician, factory worker, or whatever. I believe that any (and all) of these jobs can be incredibly thought and labor intensive.
